remarks: Value of the functor restriction operator on objects.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
resf1st.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. V ) $.
resf1st.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. W ) $.
resf1st.s $e |- ( ph -> H Fn ( S X. S ) ) $.
resf1st $p |- ( ph -> ( 1st ` ( F |`f H ) ) = ( ( 1st ` F ) |` S ) ) $.
